sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
indicates a fact or situation
, kaže, da neko dejstvo ali položaj obstaja.

seg.quote: These studies indicate that it's best to change your car every two years.
This absurd action indicated the level of their intelligence.

sense.def:
To indicate a fact
pomeni posredno omeniti neko dejstvo.

seg.quote: As I have already indicated, there is now more competition for jobs than there used to be.
I indicated that I had not seen enough of his work to be able to judge it.

sense.def:
To indicate something to someone
pomeni nekomu nekaj pokazati.

seg.quote: She sat down in the armchair that Mrs Jones indicated.

sense.def:
To indicate
pomeni med vožnjo s smernim kazalcem pokazati, v katero smer bomo zavili.
